Abstract.FreeTextAnnotation: The two wheeler was developed by the product engineering division of Bajaj Auto.Currently there are five variants available, with engine capacities of 135 cc, 150 cc, 180 cc, 200 cc, and 220 cc.

The bike is designed with a racing approach, resulting in the inclusion of a lap timer and provision for the last three 0–60 km/h timings. Apache is the first bike in India to feature a petal disc brake.

A tugboat (tug) is a boat that maneuvers vessels by pushing or towing them. Tugs move vessels that either should not move themselves, such as ships in a crowded harbor or a narrow canal, or those that cannot move by themselves, such as barges, disabled ships, log rafts, or oil platforms.

Maersk Line is the global container division and the largest operating unit of the A.P. Moller – Maersk Group, a Danish business conglomerate. It is considered the largest container shipping company in the world by revenue and employs approximately 25,000 people.s
Ship for tourism purpose

Range_Rover_Evoque-with both two-wheel and four-wheel drive. The Evoque is designed to appeal to urban buyers and meet requirements for lower CO2 emissions and fuel economy. The production vehicle is similar to the Land Rover LRX concept.
Subaru_Forester-it grew to a mid-size crossover SUV.It includes diamond plate floor, rear steel walls, a 9,500-pound winch and a roof-mounted toboggan.

Genuine Mitsubishi Evo X RS Lightweight Model This is the proper model for GPN or R4 Build only covered 9000 km from new complete with UK registration. Loads of Carbon extras wrapped in Carbon Priced to sell no offers.These cars can not be got anywhere.

Lancer_Evolution-is a high-performance sports car manufactured by Mitsubishi Motors that is based on the Lancer. There have been ten official versions to date, and the designation of each model is most commonly a roman numeral. All use two litre, turbocharged engines and all-wheel drive systems.
The Nissan Leaf (also formatted "LEAF" as a backronym for Leading, Environmentally friendly, Affordable, Family car[11]) is a compact five-door hatchbackelectric car
Planes used in Military Combat
The Cessna Citation CJ4 can fly non stop for up to 1,930 nautical mi, which is 1,140 nautical mi less than the average for all Jet Jets Prop Planes.

DTC is operating Interstate Services in 6 states viz. Punjab, Haryana, Jammu Kashmir, Uttar Pradesh, Uttarakhand and Rajasthan. The Corporation is operating about 81 Interstate Routes.Delhi Transport Corporation (DTC) is the main public transport operator of Delhi.It is the largest CNG-powered bus service operator in the world.
It was the first such form of transportation in India, opening commercial services in 1984. It is the 17th zone of the Indian Railways.

Delhi Metro is the world's thirteenth largest metro system in terms of length. Delhi Metro is India's first modern public transportation system,which has revolutionized travel by providing a fast, reliable, safe, and comfortable means of transport.

USS Arizona was a Pennsylvania-class battleship built for and by the United States Navy in the mid-1910s. Named in honor of the 48th state's recent admission into the union, the ship was the second and last of the Pennsylvania class of "super-dreadnought" battleships.

HMS Hood (pennant number 51) was the last battlecruiser built for the Royal Navy. Commissioned in 1920, she was named after the 18th-century Admiral Samuel Hood. One of four Admiral-classbattlecruisers ordered in mid-1916.
Kula Lumper Mono Rail Service with small bogey trains running on single rails.

The Mumbai Monorail is a monorail system under construction in the city of Mumbai, India as part of a major expansion of public transport in Mumbai. The project is being implemented by Mumbai Metropolitan Region Development Authority (MMRDA), with a consortium of Larsen Toubro (LT) and a Malaysian infrastructure firm Scomi Engineering.
The Honda Civic is a line of sub compact and subsequently compact cars made and manufactured by Honda.

The all-new 2012 Hyundai Accent is equipped with a 1.6-liter four-cylinder engine that produces 138 horsepower. The Accent averages 30-mpg city and 40-mpg highway, thanks to Hyundai's Gasoline Direct Injection technology.
Refreshed styling, Maruti 800 legacy, Compact proportions, Cost effective, Overall practicality. Limited space, Moderate power Performance
Swift-Best in average or fuel efficiency, best in performance, low maintenance, nice interior and perfect exterior look with the reliability of Maruti leading manufacturer of cars in India.

Air India is the flag carrier airline of India. It is part of the government owned Air India Limited (AIL). The airline operates a fleet of Airbus and Boeing aircraft serving Asia, the United States, Europe and now Australia. Its corporate office is located at the Indian Airlines House, in the parliament street of New Delhi.

Volvo Buses is a subsidiary and a business area of the Swedish vehicle maker Volvo,It is the world's largest bus manufacturer, with a complete range of heavy buses for passenger transportation. The product range includes complete buses and coaches as well as chassis combined with a comprehensive range of services.

Space Shuttle Discovery (Orbiter Vehicle Designation: OV-103) is one of the retired orbiters of the Space Shuttle program of NASA, the space agency of the United States, and was operational from its maiden flight, STS-41-D on August 30, 1984.

The Apollo program was the third human spaceflight program carried out by the National Aeronautics and Space Administration (NASA) the United States' civilian space agency. The program was responsible for the landing of the first humans on Earth's Moon in 1969.

The BMW M3 is a high-performance version of the BMW 3-Series, developed by BMW's in-house motorsport division include more powerful and responsive engines, improved handling/suspension/braking systems, aerodynamic body enhancements, and interior/exterior accents.
The crossover as a Sports Activity Vehicle, the company's proprietary descriptor for its X-line of vehicles.

The Audi A7 is a great-looking and beautifully built car. It’s superb at devouring motorway miles thanks to its stunning high-speed composure and impressive refinement. Use of aluminium in the body keeps weight, and fuel consumption, down.
The engine is the 6.0L V12 from the Aston Martin V12 Vanquish. The most recent Aston Martin has a top speed of 295 km/h (183 mph) and a 0 to 97 km/h (60 mph) time of 4.1 seconds.
The BMW Z4 is a rear-wheel drivesports car by the Germancar makerBMW. It follows a line of past BMW roadsters such as the BMW Z1, BMW 507, BMW Z8, and the BMW Z3. The Z4 replaces the Z3.
The BMW 750 is a full-size luxury vehicle produced by the German automaker BMW. It is BMW's flagship car and is only available as a sedan or extended-length limousine.

The car is already equipped with a set of Ohlins TTX dampers with a brand new spare set plus the original Bilstein dampers. There is an extensive spare parts list, including two front splitter and a new nose, a complete set of wishbones and uprights, an R8LMS flat patch and weighing scale and the Audi gearbox tool kit and gear sets.

Porsche 911 had featured in my future motoring plans. Why exactly? Well honestly, I can't put my finger on it. Many times I have wound down the windows at traffic lights to hear the Boxer next to me sing a tune. Is it the classic body lines, is it the performance, is it the hum of a flat six boxer, is it the whale tail, is it the driving position or the instrumentation.

With a transverse engine and gearbox in a mid-mounted, rear-wheel drive configuration, the X1/9 was noted for its excellent handling, lightweight-removable hardtop, front and rear-storage compartments.

The Audi R8 is a mid-engine, 2-seater sports car, which uses Audi's trademark quattro permanent all-wheel drive system.The car was exclusively designed, developed, and manufactured by Audi AG's high performance private subsidiary company, quattro GmbH, and is based on the Lamborghini Gallardo platform.
The BMW Z1 was a two-seat roadster automobile developed by BMW.The Z1 featured doors which dropped down into the door sills.The last Z1 was hand built. It was the only 2.7L version of this car.

The Tata Indica is a supermini car produced by the Indian manufacturer Tata Motors since 1998. It is the first passenger car from Tata Motors and it is also considered India's first indigenous developed passenger car.

Innova has achieved resounding success thanks to the utility (multiple purposes), excellent quality, competitive price and high resale value. Innova has quickly kept the bestselling car position in Vietnam market and becomes most suitable car to the society and most beloved by people

Asia Motor Works (AMW) is a company driven by energy, enthusiasm and a positive attitude. Its core objectives are innovation and customer satisfaction. AMW trucks offer dependability, low cost operation, unsurpassed handling, panoramic visibility, high driver comfort and ease of maintenance.
